0xA23FE32C.name: SET_PED_HAIR_TINT

params.name: ped
params.description: The Ped whose hair tint is to be set.

params.name: colorID
params.description: The tint index for the primary hair color.

params.name: highlightColorID
params.description: The tint index for the hair highlight color.

0xA23FE32C.description:
Sets the tint index for the hair on the specified ped.

```
NativeDB Introduced: v323
```

**This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native [SET_PED_HAIR_TINT](?\_0x4CFFC65454C93A49).**
